segments.text: I see the woman is just standing there, drying that plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much water is just going to waste like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking those cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is really taking a chance, standing on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting so patiently for her cookie, it's sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what the woman will do when she finally notices the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn't get too upset with the children, they're just having a bit of fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's a nice contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this scene is a perfect example of how life can be so unpredictable sometimes.
segments.speaker: PAR
